title: "Voice assistants recognize songs just by humming them"
excerpt: "Singing, humming, whistling or simply bringing the phone closer when the music plays: there are many ways to use your mobile phone to search for an unknown artist or the title of a song that is being listened to or of which the melody is remembered and not the name."
